title: Temporary assistance for needy families and food
context: [ยง346-53.3] Temporary assistance for needy families and food stamps for individuals with a felony conviction which has as an element the possession, use, or distribution of a controlled substance. Section 115(a) of Public Law 104-193 shall not apply in Hawaii to persons who are complying with treatment or who have not refused or failed to comply with treatment. [L 1997, c 128, ยง2; am L 1999, c 27, ยง1]
